text: Agitu Ideo Gudeta (; January 1, 1978 − December 29, 2020), was an Ethiopian farmer, businesswoman, and environmentalist. She created a goat farming system using the indigenous breed Pezzata Mòchena to create dairy and beauty products. On December 29, 2020, Gudeta was beaten to death with a hammer and raped in her apartment in Frassilongo, Italy at the age of 42. ==References== Category:1978 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Ethiopian people Category:African businesspeople Category:Environmentalists Category:Deaths by beating Category:Murder victims
title: Agitu Ideo Gudeta
